execution_plan.description: Find product IDs that have been ordered at least twice (appear in Order_Items two or more times).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

execution_plan.description: Select id, name, price and color for products that are NOT in the set of frequently ordered products from step 1 (i.e., products ordered fewer than twice, including never ordered).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_color FROM Products WHERE product_id NOT IN ($step1.product_id);
